thread.section_title: Coolicool 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Coolicool 的点评意见 | coolicool.com
thread.title: Jerry Beavers
thread.title_full: Coolicool 的点评人 Jerry Beavers

author: Jerry Beavers
title: Jerry Beavers
text: DHL lost my package its been a month and i still haven't received my phone i have got no help from coolicool. They tell me to wait I made a clame with paypal and the are fighting me. The are aware DHL lost my phone and told me they thank it got stolen in transit. I will never shop with them or recommend them to anyone ever.
